title: Huzzah the Ringer!
description: Huzzah! Our docket is full of Dungeons & Dragons disputes so we called upon D&D Expert Griffin McElroy (The Adventure Zone) to help us clear it!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Judge John Hodgman, MaximumFun.org)
